description: This script initializes a knowledge base with CSV data files, sets up a vector database, and uses an agent to query the data with filters. It downloads sample CSV files, loads them into a LanceDB vector store, and performs a filtered query via an agent.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database.

classes.name: CSVKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing CSV-based knowledge data and integrating with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that facilitates querying the knowledge base with filtering capabilities.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample CSV files for knowledge filters.
